headline.print_headline: Italian Holdouts in Argentina Debt Dispute Make Play for Cash
headline.main: Italian Holdouts in Argentina Debt Dispute Make Play for Cash

lead_paragraph: Italian retirees holding defaulted Argentine debt from 2002 and who spurned Buenos Aires' restructuring offers are seeking to force Bank of New York Mellon to pay out their court judgments from frozen money due holders who accepted the government's terms.
